availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Slaughter (Nelson County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Daniel S. Slaughter and Anne Eliza Hynes Slaughter. Resident of Nelson County in 1850. Household owned seven enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1850. Clerk in Nelson County in 1860. Household owned five enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1860. Clerk in Nelson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 278B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 155.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 2, p. 105.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 2, p. 136A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 4th Congressional District, Vol. 2, August 1863, p. 466, p. 169 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on April 13, 2020).
